product_name: Metolius Howlin' Wolf Chalk Pod Chalk Bag
long_description: Don't let sweaty hands keep you from reaching the top. The Metolius Howlin' Wolf Chalk Pod chalk bag has a large volume and ergonomic cut so you can easily chalk up at the gym or outdoors.
short_description: Don't let sweaty hands keep you from reaching the top. The Metolius Howlin' Wolf Chalk Pod chalk bag has a large volume and ergonomic cut so you can easily chalk up at the gym or outdoors.
